---
title: "Tables"
author: "Shreya Sinha"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("ipeds_analysis.R")
library(knitr)
```

# Change in Number of Majors Offered by Discipline

```{r echo=FALSE}
discipline_change %>% 
  select(-year) %>% 
  knitr::kable(
    col.names = c("Discipline", "Number of Majors Offered in Discipline in 2023", "Percent Change in Number of Majors (%)"),
    digits = 2,
    booktabs = TRUE
  )
```

# Change in Number of Programs Offered

```{r echo=FALSE}
major_change %>% 
  knitr::kable(
    col.names = c("CIP Family", "CIP Title", "Number of Majors Offered in 2023", "Percent Change in Number of Majors (%)"),
    digits = 2,
    booktabs = TRUE
  )
```
